name: Null Island
description:
This project is a prototype of a multiplayer survival game, made by Diogo Calçada & Ivo Ferro.

It was developed in Unity, it includes several features such as:

  • Multiplayer Coop (Default port: 25565)
  • Inventory System
  • Crafting System
  • Building System
  • Fighting
  • Hunting
  • Swimming
  • Survival Stats
  • Weather and day-night cycle
  • Chat System

Controls:

  • WASD -> Move / Swim
  • F -> Pickup / Interact
  • LMB-> Attack
  • RMB-> Block / Throw / Aim
  • Spacebar-> Jump
  • TAB -> Inventory
  • Esc -> Pause Menu
